examples.description: The WMTSInfo as used within a WMTS Layer
examples.title: Web Map Service Tile Info

description: Object defines and provides information about layers in a [WMTSLayer](webTiledLayer.md) service.
title: Web Map Tile Service Info

___url.description: URL to the WMTS web service. Required input by the user.

___layerIdentifier.description: Identifier for the specific layer used in the WMTS service. Required input by the user.

___customLayerParameters.description: A sequence of parameters used to append different custom parameters to a WMTS tile request. These parameters are applied to `GetTile`. The `customLayerParameters` property takes precedence if `customParameters` is also present.

___tileMatrixSet.description: Tiling schema, set by the WMTS service.

___customParameters.description: A sequence of parameters used to append custom parameters to all WMTS requests. These parameters are applied to `GetCapabilities` and `GetTile`. If used with the `customLayerParameters` property, `customParameters` will not take precedence.
